attributes.action: Binhamy developement,UPHOLD THE WILL OF THE PEOPLE
attributes.additional_details:
The proposed developement at Binhamy Farm Bude Cornwall was opposed by the residents of Bude and Stratton, the Town Council and the County Council. Secretary of State for Commumities and Local Government also rejected the proposed developement, but after appeal by the developers,Catesby Property Group, did a "U TURN" and allowed the proposal.
We the undersigned ask the Government to UPHOLD THE WILL OF THE PEOPLE and reject the proposed developement at Binhamy Farm Bude and thereby prevent this rape of democracy.
